thread.title: You can buy Jet Black AirPods, but they aren’t cheap
thread.title_full: You can buy Jet Black AirPods, but they aren’t cheap

author: Brandon Russell
title: You can buy Jet Black AirPods, but they aren’t cheap
text:
Since the AirPods were announced, people have begged Apple to release the headphones in different colors. At the very least, in Jet Black similar to the company’s iPhone 7. While the Cupertino company hasn’t announced any plans to release AirPods in new colors, an aftermarket company is taking the initiative.
ColorWare this week began offering customized AirPods, which can be ordered in 58 different colors. You can even paint your left AirPod one color and your right AirPod another.
See full gallery on TechnoBuffalo.com Unfortunately, as with a lot of ColorWare customizations, the service isn’t cheap. On top of the $159 you’ll pay for AirPods, ColorWare is tacking on another $130, bringing the total price to $289. That’s a lot for headphones you’ll probably lose. (But, don’t worry, Apple has a “Find My AirPods” feature on the way.)
The different colors look amazing Although the service is expensive, ColorWare does amazing work, and the AirPods do look pretty cool when they aren’t the plain white. You can also customize the AirPods’ case, which will add another $30 to your total bill.
If you do customize your AirPods, they should ship out in about six weeks. I don’t know about you, but I think the AirPods in matte black look pretty cool.
